column2: SELECT TOP # G.objID,G.ra,G.dec,s.specObjID, s.h_alpha_flux,s.h_alpha_flux_err, s.h_beta_flux,s.h_beta_flux_err, s.oiii_#_flux,s.oiii_#_flux_err, s.oiii_#_flux,s.oiii_#_flux_err, s.nii_#_flux,s.nii_#_flux_err p.z,p.zErr FROM Galaxy as G JOIN GalSpecLine AS s ON G.specObjID = s.specObjID JOIN PhotoZ AS p ON p.objID = G.objID WHERE ((# < p.z < # ) and (G.u - G.r <= #) and (G.r - G.i <= #) and (G.r - G.z <= #) and (G.g - G.r >= G.r - G.i + #) and (G.u - G.r >= #*(G.r - G.z)) )
